tasks.title: Setup Development Environment and Monorepo Structure
tasks.description: Initialize the complete development environment with monorepo structure, Docker Compose orchestration, TypeScript configuration, linting tools, and CI/CD pipeline
tasks.details: Create monorepo structure with separate directories for frontend, backend, and shared code. Configure Docker Compose for multi-service development. Setup TypeScript with strict configuration for both frontend and backend. Initialize ESLint and Prettier with consistent rules. Configure .env file management with templates. Setup pre-commit hooks for linting, formatting, and tests. Configure CI pipeline for automated testing and linting. Add .vscode and .editorconfig for consistent developer experience. Create comprehensive documentation and onboarding guides.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all services start with docker-compose up, run linting and formatting checks, ensure TypeScript compilation succeeds, test pre-commit hooks trigger correctly, validate CI pipeline runs on sample commits

subtasks.title: Create Monorepo Directory Structure
subtasks.description: Initialize the project directory structure with separate folders for frontend, backend, shared components, and configuration files
subtasks.details: Create root directory with packages/ folder containing frontend/, backend/, shared/ subdirectories. Add docs/, scripts/, and config/ folders. Initialize package.json with workspace configuration.

subtasks.title: Configure Docker Compose Multi-Service Setup
subtasks.description: Create Docker Compose configuration for orchestrating frontend, backend, database, and ROS services
subtasks.details: Build docker-compose.yml with services for React frontend, Node.js backend, PostgreSQL database, and ROS container. Configure volume mounts, environment variables, and inter-service networking.

subtasks.title: Setup TypeScript Configuration for Frontend
subtasks.description: Configure TypeScript with strict settings and React support for the frontend package
subtasks.details: Create tsconfig.json with strict mode, React JSX settings, path mapping for shared packages. Configure build and dev scripts. Setup type declarations for external libraries.

subtasks.title: Setup TypeScript Configuration for Backend
subtasks.description: Configure TypeScript with Node.js settings and strict compilation for the backend package
subtasks.details: Create tsconfig.json with Node.js target, strict type checking, and ES modules. Configure build output directory and source maps. Setup type definitions for Node.js and backend dependencies.

subtasks.title: Configure ESLint and Prettier
subtasks.description: Setup consistent code linting and formatting rules across the monorepo
subtasks.details: Create shared ESLint config with TypeScript, React, and Node.js rules. Configure Prettier for consistent formatting. Add lint-staged for pre-commit formatting. Setup IDE integration configs.

subtasks.title: Setup Environment File Management
subtasks.description: Create environment variable management system with templates and validation
subtasks.details: Create .env.example files for frontend and backend. Setup environment validation schemas. Configure Docker Compose environment file loading. Add documentation for required variables.

subtasks.title: Configure Pre-commit Hooks
subtasks.description: Setup automated pre-commit hooks for linting, formatting, and testing
subtasks.details: Install and configure husky for Git hooks. Setup lint-staged for staged file processing. Add pre-commit hooks for ESLint, Prettier, TypeScript compilation, and test execution.

subtasks.title: Setup CI/CD Pipeline Configuration
subtasks.description: Create GitHub Actions workflow for automated testing, linting, and deployment
subtasks.details: Create GitHub Actions workflow with jobs for dependency installation, linting, TypeScript compilation, testing, and Docker image building. Configure caching and parallel job execution.

subtasks.title: Configure VS Code Workspace Settings
subtasks.description: Setup VS Code configuration for optimal development experience
subtasks.details: Create .vscode/settings.json with TypeScript, ESLint, and Prettier integration. Configure recommended extensions list. Setup debug configurations for frontend and backend. Add workspace-specific settings.

subtasks.title: Create Development Documentation
subtasks.description: Write comprehensive setup and development workflow documentation
subtasks.details: Create README.md with project overview, setup instructions, and development workflow. Document environment variables, Docker usage, and testing procedures. Add contributing guidelines and code standards.

subtasks.title: Configure Package.json Scripts and Dependencies
subtasks.description: Setup npm scripts for development, building, testing, and deployment across the monorepo
subtasks.details: Configure root package.json with workspace scripts for parallel execution. Setup dev, build, test, and lint scripts for each package. Configure dependency management and version synchronization.

subtasks.title: Validate Complete Development Environment
subtasks.description: Test and verify that all components of the development environment work together correctly
subtasks.details: Run complete environment test including Docker Compose startup, all linting and formatting checks, TypeScript compilation, pre-commit hook execution, and CI pipeline validation with sample commits.

tasks.title: Implement Core Backend Services and User Authentication
tasks.description: Build the minimal backend server with user authentication, session management, and foundational API endpoints
tasks.details: Create Node.js/FastAPI backend service with TypeScript. Implement User and Project data models with proper database schema. Build REST APIs for user signup, login, logout, and session management. Implement JWT-based authentication with secure token handling. Add role-based access control (admin vs regular user). Setup WebSocket server for real-time sync. Configure database connection and migration system. Add input validation and error handling middleware.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for all API endpoints, integration tests for authentication flows, test user role permissions, validate WebSocket connections, test database operations and migrations

subtasks.title: Backend Framework Setup
subtasks.description: Initialize and configure the backend framework with TypeScript support
subtasks.details: Set up Node.js/Express or FastAPI project structure with TypeScript configuration, install core dependencies, configure build scripts, and establish development environment

subtasks.title: Database Schema Design
subtasks.description: Design and implement the database schema for users, projects, and sessions
subtasks.details: Create database schema definitions for User, Project, Session tables with proper relationships, indexes, and constraints. Define migration files and establish database connection configuration

subtasks.title: User Model Implementation
subtasks.description: Implement User data model with validation and business logic
subtasks.details: Create User model class with password hashing, validation methods, and database operations. Implement user creation, update, and deletion functionality with proper error handling

subtasks.title: Authentication Endpoints
subtasks.description: Build REST API endpoints for user signup, login, and logout
subtasks.details: Implement /auth/signup, /auth/login, /auth/logout endpoints with proper request validation, password verification, and response formatting

subtasks.title: JWT Handling
subtasks.description: Implement JWT token generation, validation, and refresh mechanisms
subtasks.details: Set up JWT token creation with secure secrets, implement token validation middleware, add refresh token functionality, and configure token expiration policies

subtasks.title: Role-Based Access Control
subtasks.description: Implement user roles and permission-based access control system
subtasks.details: Create role definitions (admin, user), implement permission checking middleware, add role-based route protection, and establish admin vs regular user access controls

subtasks.title: WebSocket Server Setup
subtasks.description: Configure WebSocket server for real-time communication and synchronization
subtasks.details: Set up WebSocket server with connection management, implement authentication for WebSocket connections, create event handling system, and establish real-time sync capabilities

subtasks.title: Database Migrations
subtasks.description: Implement database migration system and initial migrations
subtasks.details: Create migration framework, implement up/down migration scripts, add migration versioning, and establish database setup and teardown procedures

subtasks.title: Input Validation Middleware
subtasks.description: Build comprehensive input validation and sanitization middleware
subtasks.details: Implement request validation middleware with schema validation, input sanitization, parameter type checking, and proper validation error responses

subtasks.title: Error Handling Systems
subtasks.description: Create centralized error handling and logging systems
subtasks.details: Implement global error handling middleware, create custom error classes, set up logging system with different log levels, and establish error response formatting

tasks.title: Define Project Configuration Schema and Validation
tasks.description: Create comprehensive JSON/YAML schema for project configurations that will drive container generation and project management
tasks.details: Design JSON schema for project metadata including name, description, version, dependencies. Define ROS2 package specifications with task categories and algorithm selections. Create environment variable configuration structure. Add simulation settings and container resource specifications. Implement schema validation using JSON Schema or similar. Create TypeScript interfaces matching the schema. Add configuration migration system for schema updates. Include default templates for common project types.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate schema against various project configurations, test schema validation with invalid inputs, verify TypeScript interface generation, test configuration migration scripts

subtasks.title: Design Project Metadata Schema
subtasks.description: Create JSON schema for core project information including name, description, version, author details, creation/modification timestamps, and project type classification
subtasks.details: Define comprehensive project metadata structure with fields for project identification, versioning, ownership, and categorization. Include validation rules for required fields, string formats, and value constraints.

subtasks.title: Define ROS2 Package Specifications Schema
subtasks.description: Design schema for ROS2 package configuration including task categories, algorithm selections, package dependencies, and build configurations
subtasks.details: Create structured schema for ROS2-specific configurations including package manifests, dependency trees, build parameters, and algorithm suite integration points. Define task category mapping and algorithm selection validation.

subtasks.title: Create Environment Configuration Structure
subtasks.description: Design schema for environment variables, system configurations, resource limits, and runtime settings
subtasks.details: Define environment configuration schema including container resource specifications, environment variables with validation, network settings, and volume mount configurations. Include security and resource constraint definitions.

subtasks.title: Design Simulation Settings Schema
subtasks.description: Create schema for simulation parameters, world configurations, robot models, and simulation-specific settings
subtasks.details: Define comprehensive simulation configuration schema including Gazebo world settings, robot model specifications, physics parameters, sensor configurations, and simulation runtime options.

subtasks.title: Implement JSON Schema Validation System
subtasks.description: Build validation system using JSON Schema to validate project configurations against defined schemas
subtasks.details: Implement robust validation system with JSON Schema library, custom validation rules, error reporting, and validation middleware. Include schema composition and reference resolution capabilities.

subtasks.title: Generate TypeScript Interface Definitions
subtasks.description: Create TypeScript interfaces that match the JSON schemas for type-safe frontend development
subtasks.details: Build automated TypeScript interface generation from JSON schemas. Include type definitions for all configuration objects, validation helpers, and type guards for runtime type checking.

subtasks.title: Build Configuration Migration System
subtasks.description: Implement system for migrating project configurations when schemas are updated or changed
subtasks.details: Create versioned migration system with backward compatibility, automatic migration scripts, rollback capabilities, and migration validation. Include schema versioning and compatibility checking.

subtasks.title: Create Default Configuration Templates
subtasks.description: Build collection of default project templates for common ROS2 project types and use cases
subtasks.details: Create comprehensive template library including basic navigation, manipulation, perception, and custom project templates. Include template validation, customization options, and template management system.

tasks.title: Build Global ROS Workspace and Unified Docker Base Image
tasks.description: Create the comprehensive colcon workspace with all ROS packages and build the unified Docker base image supporting all algorithms
tasks.details: Setup global colcon workspace structure with all ROS2 packages organized by categories. Create Dockerfile for base image with ROS 2 Humble pre-installed. Include all curated ROS algorithms and dependencies in the base image. Configure workspace build system with proper dependency resolution. Setup automated base image building and registry publishing. Add version tagging system for base image releases. Configure security hardening for base image (non-root user, minimal attack surface). Document package organization and update procedures.
tasks.testStrategy: Build and test base image with all packages, verify colcon build succeeds for entire workspace, test image security configuration, validate package accessibility from containers

subtasks.title: Setup colcon workspace structure
subtasks.description: Create and configure the global colcon workspace directory structure with proper organization for all ROS2 packages by categories
subtasks.details: Initialize colcon workspace with src/, build/, install/, and log/ directories. Create category-based subdirectories in src/ for organizing ROS packages. Setup workspace configuration files and environment scripts.

subtasks.title: Create base Dockerfile foundation
subtasks.description: Build the foundational Dockerfile with ROS 2 Humble installation and basic system dependencies
subtasks.details: Create Dockerfile starting from Ubuntu base image. Install ROS 2 Humble, essential build tools, and system dependencies. Configure locale and environment variables for ROS.

subtasks.title: Integrate ROS2 packages into workspace
subtasks.description: Add all curated ROS algorithms and packages to the colcon workspace structure organized by meta-categories
subtasks.details: Clone and organize ROS packages into category directories. Configure package.xml files and dependencies. Ensure proper workspace overlay structure.

subtasks.title: Configure dependency resolution system
subtasks.description: Setup rosdep and package dependency management for automated resolution of ROS package dependencies
subtasks.details: Configure rosdep database updates. Create dependency installation scripts. Setup package.xml dependency resolution and validation.

subtasks.title: Implement automated build system
subtasks.description: Create colcon build configuration and automated building system for the entire workspace
subtasks.details: Configure colcon build with parallel execution. Create build scripts with proper error handling. Setup incremental build optimization and caching.

subtasks.title: Setup image registry configuration
subtasks.description: Configure Docker registry setup for publishing and managing base image versions
subtasks.details: Setup Docker registry configuration. Create image pushing and pulling scripts. Configure registry authentication and access controls.

subtasks.title: Implement version tagging system
subtasks.description: Create automated version tagging and release management system for base image builds
subtasks.details: Implement semantic versioning for base images. Create automated tagging based on workspace changes. Setup version tracking and changelog generation.

subtasks.title: Apply security hardening measures
subtasks.description: Implement security best practices including non-root user configuration and minimal attack surface
subtasks.details: Create non-root user for container execution. Remove unnecessary packages and tools. Configure proper file permissions and security policies.

subtasks.title: Create comprehensive documentation
subtasks.description: Document the workspace structure, build process, usage instructions, and maintenance procedures
subtasks.details: Create README files for workspace structure. Document build and deployment procedures. Add troubleshooting guides and maintenance instructions.

tasks.title: Develop ROS Algorithm Suite and Task Categories System
tasks.description: Create the curated suite of ROS algorithms organized by meta-categories and task categories with comprehensive metadata
tasks.details: Define meta-categories (actuator, camera, remote control, arm control, voice control, mapping, localization, planning, person tracking, person recognition, character animation). Create task category structure with multiple solution alternatives per category. Document each algorithm with clear task definition, input/output relations, and ROS package dependencies. Build metadata storage system for algorithm information. Implement package selection logic for copying only required packages to user workspaces. Create algorithm discovery and search functionality. Add validation for algorithm compatibility and dependencies.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate all algorithm metadata, test package selection and copying logic, verify algorithm compatibility matrix, test search and discovery functionality

subtasks.title: Define ROS Meta-Categories Framework
subtasks.description: Establish the foundational meta-category structure for organizing ROS algorithms including actuator, camera, remote control, arm control, voice control, mapping, localization, planning, person tracking, person recognition, and character animation categories
subtasks.details: Create comprehensive meta-category definitions with clear boundaries and hierarchical relationships. Define category attributes, scope, and classification criteria. Establish naming conventions and taxonomy structure for consistent organization.

subtasks.title: Design Task Category Structure System
subtasks.description: Create the detailed task category structure within each meta-category, supporting multiple solution alternatives and hierarchical organization
subtasks.details: Design task category schema with support for multiple algorithms per category. Define category hierarchy levels and relationships. Create structure for alternative solutions and algorithm variants within categories.

subtasks.title: Develop Algorithm Documentation Schema
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation schema for algorithms including task definitions, input/output specifications, and ROS package dependencies
subtasks.details: Define standardized algorithm documentation format. Create schemas for task definitions, input/output relations, parameter specifications, and dependency tracking. Establish documentation templates and validation rules.

subtasks.title: Implement Metadata Storage System
subtasks.description: Build the storage system for algorithm metadata with efficient querying and retrieval capabilities
subtasks.details: Design database schema for algorithm metadata storage. Implement data access layer with CRUD operations. Create indexing strategy for efficient searches. Add data validation and integrity constraints.

subtasks.title: Create Package Selection Logic
subtasks.description: Develop intelligent package selection system that identifies and copies only required ROS packages based on algorithm dependencies
subtasks.details: Implement dependency resolution algorithm for ROS packages. Create package copying logic with dependency tracking. Add optimization for minimal package selection. Implement validation for package compatibility and requirements.

subtasks.title: Build Algorithm Discovery Functionality
subtasks.description: Implement search and discovery features for finding algorithms based on criteria, capabilities, and requirements
subtasks.details: Create search engine for algorithm discovery. Implement filtering by meta-category, task type, and capabilities. Add recommendation system for similar algorithms. Create browsing interface for algorithm exploration.

subtasks.title: Develop Compatibility Validation System
subtasks.description: Create validation system to ensure algorithm compatibility with project requirements and ROS versions
subtasks.details: Implement compatibility matrix for algorithms and ROS versions. Create validation rules for package dependencies. Add conflict detection and resolution suggestions. Implement version compatibility checks.

subtasks.title: Implement Search and Filtering Interface
subtasks.description: Build user interface for searching, filtering, and selecting algorithms with advanced query capabilities
subtasks.details: Create search interface with advanced filtering options. Implement faceted search by meta-category, complexity, and requirements. Add algorithm comparison features. Create selection interface for project integration.

tasks.title: Implement Container Management System with Strict Isolation
tasks.description: Build the automated container lifecycle management system with strict project isolation and resource controls
tasks.details: Implement Docker API integration for container operations. Create unique naming convention (robium_{user_id}_{project_id}). Build container lifecycle management (create, start, stop, destroy). Implement strict volume isolation preventing cross-project access. Configure network isolation between project containers. Add resource limits (CPU, memory, disk). Setup persistent workspace mounting from host filesystem. Implement automated cleanup of idle containers. Add container health monitoring and logging. Configure security policies and non-root execution.
tasks.testStrategy: Test container isolation between projects, verify volume access restrictions, validate resource limits enforcement, test automated cleanup procedures, verify security configurations

subtasks.title: Docker API Integration Setup
subtasks.description: Integrate Docker API client library and establish connection management for container operations
subtasks.details: Install and configure Docker SDK/API client library. Implement connection pooling and error handling for Docker daemon communication. Create base Docker service class with authentication and health checks.

subtasks.title: Container Naming Convention Implementation
subtasks.description: Implement unique naming convention system for container identification and management
subtasks.details: Create naming convention robium_{user_id}_{project_id} with validation. Implement name collision detection and resolution. Add container tagging system for metadata and filtering.

subtasks.title: Container Lifecycle Management
subtasks.description: Build comprehensive container lifecycle operations for create, start, stop, and destroy
subtasks.details: Implement container creation with project-specific configurations. Add start/stop operations with state tracking. Build destroy operation with cleanup verification. Add lifecycle event logging and error recovery.

subtasks.title: Volume Isolation Implementation
subtasks.description: Configure strict volume isolation to prevent cross-project data access
subtasks.details: Create project-specific volume namespaces. Implement volume access controls and permissions. Add volume cleanup and orphan detection. Configure read-only and read-write volume mounting strategies.

subtasks.title: Network Isolation Configuration
subtasks.description: Implement network isolation between project containers for security
subtasks.details: Create isolated Docker networks per project. Configure network policies and firewall rules. Implement inter-container communication controls. Add network monitoring and traffic logging.

subtasks.title: Resource Limits Configuration
subtasks.description: Implement CPU, memory, and disk resource limits for container resource management
subtasks.details: Configure CPU and memory limits based on project requirements. Implement disk space quotas and monitoring. Add resource usage tracking and alerting. Create resource scaling policies for different project types.

subtasks.title: Workspace Mounting System
subtasks.description: Setup persistent workspace mounting from host filesystem to containers
subtasks.details: Implement secure host filesystem mounting for project workspaces. Configure bind mounts with proper permissions. Add workspace backup and restoration capabilities. Implement file synchronization for real-time updates.

subtasks.title: Automated Cleanup Service
subtasks.description: Build automated cleanup system for idle and orphaned containers
subtasks.details: Implement idle container detection based on activity thresholds. Create scheduled cleanup jobs for resource optimization. Add grace period handling and user notifications. Build cleanup policies for different container states.

subtasks.title: Container Health Monitoring
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive health monitoring and status tracking for containers
subtasks.details: Create health check mechanisms for container status. Implement performance monitoring and metrics collection. Add alerting system for container failures. Build health dashboard and reporting features.

subtasks.title: Container Logging Setup
subtasks.description: Configure centralized logging system for container operations and application logs
subtasks.details: Setup log aggregation from containers to centralized system. Implement log rotation and retention policies. Add structured logging with metadata and filtering. Create log viewing and search interface.

subtasks.title: Security Policy Implementation
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive security policies and access controls for container management
subtasks.details: Configure container security contexts and capabilities restrictions. Implement user namespace mapping and privilege controls. Add security scanning and vulnerability detection. Create security audit logging and compliance reporting.

tasks.title: Create Automated Dockerfile Generation Service
tasks.description: Build the service that generates project-specific Dockerfiles and docker-compose files from project configurations
tasks.details: Implement Dockerfile template engine using project configuration schema. Generate project-specific Dockerfiles inheriting from base image. Create docker-compose.yml generation for project environments. Add support for custom environment variables and dependencies. Implement workspace volume configuration. Add support for simulation settings and tool integration. Create validation for generated Docker configurations. Implement caching strategies for faster builds. Add logging and error handling for generation failures.
tasks.testStrategy: Test Dockerfile generation with various project configurations, validate generated docker-compose files, test container builds from generated files, verify workspace mounting and environment variables

subtasks.title: Template Engine Implementation
subtasks.description: Build the core template engine for processing Dockerfile and docker-compose templates with project configuration data
subtasks.details: Implement template parsing system with variable substitution, conditional logic, and iteration support. Create template validation and error handling. Support for nested configurations and dynamic content generation.

subtasks.title: Dockerfile Generation Logic
subtasks.description: Create the service logic for generating project-specific Dockerfiles from base templates and project configurations
subtasks.details: Implement Dockerfile generation using template engine with base image inheritance. Support for custom dependencies, build steps, and environment setup. Add validation for generated Dockerfiles and build optimization.

subtasks.title: Docker-compose.yml Generation
subtasks.description: Build the system for creating docker-compose files with service definitions, networking, and volume configurations
subtasks.details: Generate docker-compose files with proper service definitions, network configuration, and volume mounting. Support for multi-service projects and custom service dependencies. Include development and production environment variants.

subtasks.title: Environment Variable Support
subtasks.description: Implement environment variable management and injection system for containerized environments
subtasks.details: Create environment variable template processing and validation. Support for project-specific variables, secrets management, and environment-specific configurations. Implement variable inheritance and override mechanisms.

subtasks.title: Workspace Configuration
subtasks.description: Build workspace volume configuration and mounting system for development environments
subtasks.details: Implement workspace directory mapping and volume configuration. Support for source code mounting, build artifacts, and persistent data volumes. Add workspace synchronization and permission management.

subtasks.title: Validation System
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive validation system for generated Docker configurations and project settings
subtasks.details: Implement validation for generated Dockerfiles, docker-compose files, and environment configurations. Add schema validation, dependency checking, and configuration consistency verification. Include validation error reporting and suggestions.

subtasks.title: Caching Strategies Implementation
subtasks.description: Build caching system for optimizing Docker builds and template generation performance
subtasks.details: Implement template caching, generated file caching, and Docker layer caching strategies. Add cache invalidation logic based on configuration changes. Include build optimization and incremental generation support.

tasks.title: Build Frontend UI Shell and User Authentication Interface
tasks.description: Create the main React application structure with user authentication flows and responsive design
tasks.details: Initialize React application with TypeScript and modern tooling (Vite/Create React App). Design responsive UI layout with navigation, header, and main content areas. Implement signup and login forms with validation. Create protected route system based on authentication state. Build user session management with token refresh. Add loading states and error handling throughout UI. Implement consistent design system with components library. Add responsive design for desktop and tablet. Configure routing with React Router. Add accessibility features and ARIA labels.
tasks.testStrategy: Test authentication flows end-to-end, validate form validation and error handling, test responsive design across devices, verify protected routes work correctly, test session management and token refresh

subtasks.title: React Application Setup and Configuration
subtasks.description: Initialize React application with TypeScript, modern tooling (Vite), and essential dependencies for authentication and routing
subtasks.details: Set up React project with TypeScript, configure Vite/bundler, install dependencies for routing (React Router), authentication, HTTP client (axios), and UI components. Configure development environment with ESLint, Prettier, and TypeScript configurations.

subtasks.title: Responsive Layout Design and Structure
subtasks.description: Create the main application layout with responsive navigation, header, sidebar, and content areas
subtasks.details: Design and implement responsive layout components including main app shell, navigation header, sidebar menu, and content containers. Ensure mobile-first responsive design with proper breakpoints for desktop, tablet, and mobile views.

subtasks.title: Authentication Forms Implementation
subtasks.description: Build signup and login forms with validation, error handling, and user feedback
subtasks.details: Create login and signup forms with form validation, password strength checking, error display, and success feedback. Implement form state management and user input validation with proper error messages.

subtasks.title: Protected Routing System
subtasks.description: Implement route protection based on authentication state and user roles
subtasks.details: Set up React Router with protected routes, authentication guards, role-based access control, and proper redirects for unauthenticated users. Create higher-order components for route protection.

subtasks.title: Session Management and Token Handling
subtasks.description: Build user session management with JWT token storage, refresh, and automatic logout
subtasks.details: Implement authentication context, token storage (localStorage/sessionStorage), automatic token refresh, session timeout handling, and logout functionality. Create authentication hooks and utilities.

subtasks.title: Loading and Error States Management
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive loading indicators and error handling throughout the application
subtasks.details: Implement loading spinners, skeleton screens, error boundaries, toast notifications, and global error handling. Create reusable loading and error components with consistent styling.

subtasks.title: Design System and Component Library
subtasks.description: Build a consistent design system with reusable UI components and styling standards
subtasks.details: Create design tokens, color schemes, typography system, and reusable components (buttons, inputs, cards, modals). Implement consistent styling approach using CSS modules or styled-components.

subtasks.title: Accessibility Features Implementation
subtasks.description: Add accessibility features including keyboard navigation, ARIA labels, and screen reader support
subtasks.details: Implement WCAG compliance with proper ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, focus management, semantic HTML, and screen reader compatibility. Add accessibility testing and validation.

subtasks.title: Routing Configuration and Navigation
subtasks.description: Configure complete application routing with nested routes, breadcrumbs, and navigation state
subtasks.details: Set up React Router configuration with nested routes, route parameters, query string handling, breadcrumb navigation, and active state management for navigation items.

tasks.title: Implement Project Management and Configuration UI
tasks.description: Build the user interface for project creation, configuration, task selection, and management dashboard
tasks.details: Create project dashboard showing user's projects with filtering and search. Build project creation wizard with configuration forms. Implement task selection interface with algorithm suite integration. Create project settings panel for environment variables and dependencies. Add project configuration editor with schema validation. Implement project sharing and export functionality. Create admin dashboard for managing all projects. Add project versioning interface with basic version control. Implement drag-and-drop task organization. Add real-time configuration validation and preview.
tasks.testStrategy: Test project CRUD operations, validate configuration forms and schema validation, test task selection and algorithm integration, verify admin vs user access controls, test project sharing functionality

subtasks.title: Create Project Dashboard Interface
subtasks.description: Build the main dashboard showing user's projects with filtering, search, and overview cards
subtasks.details: Implement project grid/list view with project cards showing name, description, status, last modified. Add search functionality and filtering by status/category. Include quick actions like edit, delete, clone project.

subtasks.title: Build Project Creation Wizard
subtasks.description: Create step-by-step wizard for new project creation with guided configuration
subtasks.details: Multi-step wizard with project details, algorithm selection, environment configuration, and review steps. Include form validation and progress indicator.

subtasks.title: Implement Task Selection Interface
subtasks.description: Build interface for browsing and selecting algorithms from the ROS algorithm suite
subtasks.details: Create categorized algorithm browser with search, filtering by meta-categories, algorithm comparison, and selection interface with dependency visualization.

subtasks.title: Create Project Settings Panel
subtasks.description: Build comprehensive settings interface for project configuration management
subtasks.details: Settings panel with tabs for general settings, environment variables, dependencies, simulation parameters, and advanced configurations with form validation.

subtasks.title: Develop Configuration Editor with Schema Validation
subtasks.description: Create advanced configuration editor with real-time schema validation and auto-completion
subtasks.details: JSON/YAML editor with syntax highlighting, schema validation, auto-completion, and error highlighting. Support for configuration templates and validation rules.

subtasks.title: Implement Project Sharing and Export Functionality
subtasks.description: Build features for sharing projects and exporting configurations
subtasks.details: Project sharing with permission management, export to various formats (ZIP, tar), import functionality, and public project gallery with sharing controls.

subtasks.title: Create Admin Dashboard
subtasks.description: Build administrative interface for managing all projects and users
subtasks.details: Admin-only dashboard with user management, project oversight, system metrics, resource usage monitoring, and administrative controls with role-based access.

subtasks.title: Develop Project Versioning Interface
subtasks.description: Create interface for project version control and history management
subtasks.details: Version history view, branch creation/switching, diff visualization, commit functionality, and rollback capabilities with git-like version control interface.

subtasks.title: Implement Drag-and-Drop Organization
subtasks.description: Add drag-and-drop functionality for organizing projects and algorithms
subtasks.details: Drag-and-drop for project organization, algorithm arrangement, folder creation, bulk operations, and intuitive project management with visual feedback.

subtasks.title: Build Real-time Validation Implementation
subtasks.description: Implement real-time form validation and configuration checking across all interfaces
subtasks.details: Real-time validation for all forms, configuration syntax checking, dependency validation, resource requirement validation, and instant feedback with error recovery suggestions.

tasks.title: Build Execution Environment and Debugging Interface
tasks.description: Create the execution interface with web terminal, container management, and debugging tools integration
tasks.details: Implement web-based terminal using xterm.js or similar for container access. Build execution control panel with start/stop/restart functionality. Create real-time log streaming from containers with filtering and search. Implement WebSocket integration for live terminal and log updates. Add container resource monitoring (CPU, memory usage). Create RViz and Gazebo embedding interface preparation. Implement rosbag playback controls. Add debugging tools integration (gdb, valgrind access). Create execution status indicators and progress tracking. Add error handling and recovery procedures for failed executions.
tasks.testStrategy: Test web terminal functionality and command execution, validate real-time log streaming, test container execution controls, verify WebSocket connections for live updates, test debugging tool integration and rosbag functionality

subtasks.title: Implement Web Terminal Interface
subtasks.description: Create web-based terminal using xterm.js for container access with command execution capabilities
subtasks.details: Setup xterm.js library, implement WebSocket connection for terminal I/O, handle terminal resizing, implement copy/paste functionality, add terminal themes and customization options

subtasks.title: Build Execution Control Panel
subtasks.description: Create control panel with start/stop/restart functionality for container management
subtasks.details: Design control panel UI, implement container lifecycle controls, add execution status indicators, create action confirmation dialogs, handle error states gracefully

subtasks.title: Implement Real-time Log Streaming
subtasks.description: Create log streaming system with filtering, search, and real-time updates from containers
subtasks.details: Setup log aggregation from containers, implement WebSocket-based streaming, add log filtering by level/source, create search functionality, implement log buffering and pagination

subtasks.title: Setup WebSocket Integration
subtasks.description: Implement WebSocket connections for live terminal and log updates
subtasks.details: Configure WebSocket server endpoints, implement connection management, handle reconnection logic, add authentication for WebSocket connections, implement message routing

subtasks.title: Create Resource Monitoring System
subtasks.description: Implement container resource monitoring for CPU, memory, and disk usage
subtasks.details: Setup Docker stats API integration, create real-time resource charts, implement resource usage alerts, add historical resource data tracking, create resource usage reports

subtasks.title: Prepare RViz/Gazebo Interface
subtasks.description: Create interface preparation for embedding RViz and Gazebo visualization tools
subtasks.details: Research RViz web integration options, setup NoVNC or similar for GUI forwarding, implement iframe embedding for visualization tools, handle authentication for GUI access, optimize performance for remote rendering

subtasks.title: Implement Rosbag Controls
subtasks.description: Create rosbag playback controls with play/pause/seek functionality
subtasks.details: Design rosbag control interface, implement rosbag command integration, add playback timeline visualization, create rosbag file browser, implement recording functionality

subtasks.title: Integrate Debugging Tools
subtasks.description: Add debugging tools integration including gdb and valgrind access
subtasks.details: Setup debugging tool accessibility through web terminal, create debugging session management, implement breakpoint visualization, add memory debugging interface, create debugging workflow guides

subtasks.title: Create Status Indicators
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive status indicators for all system components
subtasks.details: Design status indicator system, implement container health status, add execution progress indicators, create system health dashboard, implement status notification system

subtasks.title: Implement Error Recovery Procedures
subtasks.description: Create automated error recovery and manual recovery procedures for system failures
subtasks.details: Design error detection mechanisms, implement automatic recovery procedures, create manual recovery workflows, add error logging and reporting, implement graceful degradation strategies
